version_description: Various small improvements and bugfixes

- Goofy Stance
- Fixes issues with signing up with Facebook not working, or causing data loss.

- Fixed issue with potential credit loss when creating an account.
- Minor optimizations.

- Fixed issues with subscriptions
- Fixed issue iPad Pro which caused game to freeze
- Improved some data syncing issues (However, there still issues we need to fix that can occur if a data connection becomes inconsistent)
- Improved scoring for airs
- Fixed completion scoring and display for ranks and friends.
Bug fixes
- Bug fixes to improve data synchronization issues.
- Improved wave scoring.

- Additional shorter length competitions.
- Improved wave scoring.
News updates now shown in community menu
New messages in notifications area.

New Quiksilver wetsuits and shorts
New Roxy bikini
Reduced scores if you wipe out in a barrel
The WSL 2019 Season has been added. Are you ready?
Bug fixes for IAP prices not showing correctly
Check out the new soft tops from Catch Surf ®

Check out the new soft tops from Catch Surf®
Fixes for some performance and store issues
New beach added, Keramas

3x New Stretch Boards
3x New Catch Surf® boardshorts
True Surf's wave simulation has been updated to match the real world conditions even better. Compare them at Surfline.com

New surfboards and apparel!
Improved UI

New surfboards and apparel!
Improve UI
New settings option to use original drop in bar
Bug fixes for inverted controls
New WSL Events

New WSL Events
Bug fixes for controls and HUD

• All new travel system!
We listened to your feedback and added a whole new way to travel. Choose how you get to your next break. Take the VIP travel plan and pay with Clams, or travel on a budget and wait it out.

• Enhanced wave rendering
Each wave is now smoother to look at and more satisfying to carve.

• Improved surf conditions
All locations now have more wave variety to better match the live current real-world conditions.

• All new travel system!
We listened to your feedback and added a whole new way to travel. Choose how you get to your next break. Take the VIP travel plan and pay with Clams, or travel on a budget and wait it out. (1.1.03 has a fix for Frequent Flyer's)

• Enhanced wave rendering
Each wave is now smoother to look at and more satisfying to carve.

• Improved surf conditions
All locations now have more wave variety to better match the live current real-world conditions.
New boards from Pyzel

Update Travel UI to help you get where you are going.
Bugs fixes.
Fix for a crash on iOS 11

New Boards from Rusty
Apple Sign-in added
Bug fixes

New Boards from Rusty
Apple Sign-in added
Bug fixes

- Improved Live Surfline Conditions UI and Travel UI to get you to your favourite Surf Spot faster.
- Bug fixes.

- New WSL Events UI.
- Goofy stance bug fixed.

- Improvements to Surf Spots including Skeleton Bay and Pipe.
- New lighting that improves the look of characters, boards and apparel.
- Bug fixes

- New Statistics page in Me menu
- Bug fixes

- New Missions for beginner players
- Existing players activate Missions in Settings>Play>Hud
- minor bug fix

- Missions improvement
- Minor bug fixes
- New Surf Spot: Newcastle, Australia

- New Surf Spot: Narrabeen, Australia
- Scoring updates: fixed Air Rotation bug, close out barrels don't count, bottom turns counted in flow.
- Fixed "Mission Failed issue" at Bells Beach

- fixed scoring issue with not gaining shaka for some maneuvers
- fixed issue with some players arriving at Prototype Surf Spot.

Fixed Mission icon bug in Surf Spot.
New WSL Event: Margaret River Pro; May 2 - 12
- New WSL Event: Rip Curl Rottnest Search

- New WSL Event: Surf Ranch Pro
- New Wave Hunter feature
- Minor bug fixes
- Fixed shader issue on certain devices
- Minor bug fixes.

- New Surf Event: Shidashita Beach, Japan
- Fixed Ribbon during ride
- New for Streamers: Hide UI during competition
- New WSL Event: Barra de la Cruz, Mexico; Aug 10 - 19
- Minor bug fixes
